title: Team Silver ranked
body:
Just got into silver today and I'm looking for a team to play with, or maybe even a partner will do

I'm a sona main, or a support main (bc of these fkn nerfs)

add me if youre interested :D

replies.body: Add me, i main supp, jg, and top.
I mainly play mid and support, but I can adc if i need to. Add me if you're still looking.
Add me I'm a mid main and I'm silver 4
Throw me an add if ya can. I will probably forget but I'm keen to play with you.
